ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maybe verant should hire Alan Greenspan to help control EverQuest inflation :) Rokenn (who listens to far too much NPR) Swiftsong - Karana server EQ Bard
ygData.messageBody:
>From: <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] A rant
>Date: Thu, 10 Feb 2000 12:17:08 -0500 (EST)
>
>On Tue, 8 Feb 2000, Kenneth E. Bachman wrote:
> >
> > it. I have, for a couple of months now, been admiring the
> > Planes stuff I've seen other people wearing, and checking
> > out the stats of new stuff as it is discovered, and
> > dreaming of owning it. By the time I get level 50, I will
> > have earned the right to go after this stuff, as far as I
> > am concerned. Now I may have to play *another year*
> > before I get to have any of it? I hope they don't screw
>
>It's called inflation. And it sucks for the same reason price
>inflation sucks in the RL economy (more even, since price
>inflation is usually accompanied by wage inflation). Verant
>would be well advised to realize this before "upgrading"
>things too much.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>


Maybe verant should hire Alan Greenspan to help control EverQuest
'inflation' :)

Rokenn (who listens to far too much NPR) Swiftsong - Karana server
